sense.gloss: to cry out in one's sleep (e.g. from having a nightmare), to moan (in anguish) in one's sleep
to be tormented (by dreams), to have a nightmare
killing someone with a magical curse

sdata.j: ↑悪夢↑↓あくむ↓に↑魘↑↓うな↓された。

words.gloss: to cry out in one's sleep (e.g. from having a nightmare), to moan (in anguish) in one's sleep

killing someone with a magical curse
